7.name: Indiscriminate Slayer
7.description: If small things were meant to live, they'd have bigger teeth or faster feet.

68.name: Waking from the Nightmare
68.description: You were awakened in the Dream and beat back the nightmare threat.
68.requirement: Complete the sylvari personal story step "Beneath a Cold Moon," "Black Night, White Stag," "The Heart of Nightmare," or "The Knight's Duel."

86.name: Artificer
86.requirement: Reach rating  in the artificer discipline.

90.name: Huntsman
90.requirement: Reach rating  in the huntsman discipline.

158.name: Buried Archives
158.description: Uncover the secrets of the buried archives.

221.name: Cleaning Up the Neighborhood
221.requirement: Tore down all of the Separatist propaganda posters in one day.

238.name: Monthly Salvage Kit Usages
238.description: Items broken down for parts this month.

279.name: Champion Phantom
279.description: Walking the line between life and death—your life, their death.
279.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a necromancer.

390.name: Urban Battleground Fractal Stabilizer
390.description: The city is yours! What's left of it anyways.
390.requirement: You've completed the Urban Battleground fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

485.name: Keg Brawl Fumble Forcer
485.requirement: Knock an opponent's keg loose during the Hoelbrak keg brawl.

518.name: Hero Point Amasser
518.requirement: Acquire  hero points from hero challenges or by leveling with a character already at level 80.

591.name: Southsun Elevation Sample Collection
591.description: Collect a sample from the highest point on Southsun Cove.

595.name: Southsun Vent Sample Collection
595.description: Collect a sample from the steam vents along Southsun Shoals.

663.name: Hard Boiled (2013)
663.requirement: Track down and talk to Marjory at The Dead End in Divinity's Reach.

672.name: Blackout Cache
672.requirement: Loot the Aetherblade Cache in Obsidian Sanctum (World vs. World).

745.name: Gnashblade: Maw Mulcher
745.requirement: Defeat the Jade Maw in the Fractals of the Mists while supporting Evon Gnashblade.

746.name: Gnashblade: Direct Support
746.requirement: Complete tiers 1 and 2 of Evon Gnashblade's candidate trials.

755.name: Crabgrabber
755.description: Steal and deny the crab from other players in the Southsun Crab Toss.

769.name: Queen's Jubilee Completionist
769.requirement: Complete achievements from either this category or Jubilee dailies.

832.name: Indiscriminate Adversary
832.requirement: Defeat a boss from each of Scarlet's armies during her portal invasions.

879.name: Professional Ice Skater
879.requirement: Complete World 2, Zone 3 without being frozen by a banana.

917.name: Lionguard Justice
917.description: Everyone goes home today...well, except the Aetherblades.
917.requirement: Defeat the remaining Aetherblades without losing any Lionguards.

1155.name: Fractal Fortnight: Aetherblade
1155.requirement: You've completed the Aetherblade fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1209.name: Nightmare Terminator
1209.requirement: Complete "The Nightmare Ends" story instance, having chosen all the combat versions of Scarlet's puzzles.

1224.name: Aftermath Toxic Boss Slayer II
1224.requirement: Defeat the toxic spider queen, toxic wurm queen, toxic alchemist, or toxic warlock.

1226.name: Aftermath Toxic Alliance Slayer II
1226.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1236.name: Aftermath Toxic Field Researcher III
1236.requirement: Collect  toxic spore samples by destroying toxic offshoots.

1276.name: Spreading Wintersday Joy III
1276.description: Make the lives of the less fortunate in Divinity's Reach a little better.
1276.requirement: Make a donation to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

1278.name: Winter Wonderland Winner III
1278.description: Make a run for some holiday cheer.
1278.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle.

1321.name: Boss Thumper V
1321.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1345.name: Delaqua Investigator
1345.requirement: Help Marjory and Kasmeer investigate Scarlet's motives.

1367.name: Tidal Splash
1367.requirement: Equip a pair of diving goggles, jump off the top of Inferno's Needle, and land in a bucket of water.

1388.name: Group Effort V
1388.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1388.requirement: Participate in defeating Scarlet's assault knights during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

1508.name: In a Cage Made of Steel and Lunacy

1522.name: Nowhere to Hide
1522.requirement: Defeat Scarlet before she can activate her personal shield.

1529.name: Breakdown in Command
1529.requirement: Participated in any champion event in Lion's Arch.

1679.name: Finish What You Started
1679.requirement: Successfully complete all five Breaking the Ice events in Frostgorge Sound.

bits.text: Drive the Sons of Svanir from Coiled Watch.
Defend Coiled Watch.
Escort the explosives-laden dolyaks to the Barrowstead.
Destroy the totem foci to stop the Svanir corruption ritual.
Defeat the dragon shamans.

1687.name: Birthday—Year 7
1687.description: You have a character that is more than 7 years old.

1693.name: Licensed Learned Legendary Llama Locator
1693.requirement: Find the legendary llama hidden in Challenger Cliffs.

1731.name: Exotic Attire
1731.requirement: Unlock these  crafted exotic armor skins in your wardrobe.

1757.name: World Contributor Round 2
1757.requirement: Participate in round two of the tournament. Complete any  WvW event this week.

1780.name: Bandit Weapons Specialist
1780.requirement: Unlock all  bandit weapon skins in your wardrobe.
1780.locked_text: Purchase a Bandit Combat Journal from a bandit-crest vendor in the Silverwastes.

1966.name: Daily Fireheart Rise Event Completer
1966.requirement: Complete events in Fireheart Rise in Ascalon.

2062.name: Shrubsplosives
2062.requirement: Defeat the cave enemy and detonate every bomb plant without taking bomb damage. Timed-out bomb plants negate achievement eligibility.

2311.name: Kudzu II: The Perfected Longbow
2311.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Leaf of Kudzu has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of woodworking.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to balancing a stave.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of tanning.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to reinforcing strings.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secrets of superior woodworking tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Herbal Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2354.name: HOPE II: Development
2354.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Prototype has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of woodworking.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to mechanical pistol frames.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secret to precision barrels.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secrets of precision forging tools.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Herbal Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2371.name: Chak Crusher
2371.requirement: Defeat the Chak Driver in Tangled Depths.

2388.name: Rodgort III: Rodgort's Flame
2388.description: Fire provides both heat and light, inflicting burns against the foe and calling attention to itself through its bright, flickering nature. Use the flames for both weal and woe as you attain the legendary precursor Rodgort's Flame.

bits.text: Take a torch from the grawl village near Safewatch Vale in Frostgorge Sound and use it to kill a Veteran Pinesoul.
Take a torch from the grawl village near Safewatch Vale in Frostgorge Sound and use it to kill a Veteran Longhorn Sheep.
Take a torch from the grawl village near Safewatch Vale in Frostgorge Sound and use it to kill a Veteran Eagle Griffon.
Take a torch from the grawl village near Safewatch Vale in Frostgorge Sound and use it to kill a Veteran Arctodus.
Take a torch from the grawl village near Safewatch Vale in Frostgorge Sound and use it to kill a Veteran Alpine Stalker.
Take a torch from the grawl villages in Fireheart Rise and use it to kill a Veteran Moose.
Take a torch from the grawl villages in Fireheart Rise and use it to kill a Veteran Oakheart.
Take a torch from the grawl villages in Fireheart Rise and use it to kill a Veteran Black Bear.
Take a torch from the grawl villages in Fireheart Rise and use it to kill a Veteran Marmox.
Take a torch from the grawl villages in Fireheart Rise and use it to kill a Veteran Tar Elemental.
Take a torch from the campfire in Blackhold Mine Camp in Harathi Hinterlands and use it to kill a Veteran Eagle Griffon.
Take a torch from the campfire in Blackhold Mine Camp in Harathi Hinterlands and use it to kill a Veteran Freshwater Crab.
Take a torch from the campfire in Blackhold Mine Camp in Harathi Hinterlands and use it to kill a Veteran Eagle Raptor.
Take a torch from the campfire in Blackhold Mine Camp in Harathi Hinterlands and use it to kill a Veteran Bear.
Take a torch from the campfire in Blackhold Mine Camp in Harathi Hinterlands and use it to kill a Veteran Longhorn Sheep.
Take a torch from the campfire in Sootberme in Mount Maelstrom and use it to kill a Veteran Firefly.
Take a torch from the campfire in Sootberme in Mount Maelstrom and use it to kill a Veteran Pink Moa.
Take a torch from the campfire in Sootberme in Mount Maelstrom and use it to kill a Veteran Mossheart.
Take a torch from the campfire in Sootberme in Mount Maelstrom and use it to kill a Veteran Hermit Crab.
Take a torch from the campfire in Sootberme in Mount Maelstrom and use it to kill a Veteran Jungle Spider.
Light the bonfire in the Snowblind Fractal.
Use the bonfires in Fields of Ruin to draw out the Champion Branded Griffon and kill it.
Light the bonfire to draw out the Marmox pack in Blazeridge Steppes.
Stoke the fire pit at Bloodsaw Mill using 10 elder wood logs.
Use a torch to light centaur supplies on fire in the Blackhold Mine Camp in Harathi Hinterlands.
Light the hylek signal fires at Southwatch Post in Sparkfly Fen.
Light the brambles on fire in Joy's End to deter the Nightmare Court.
Light the signal fires to call down an air strike in the Silverwastes.
Burn a Risen Corpse in Caledon Forest.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2389.name: Quip I: The Experimental Pistol
2389.description: Humor is in the mind of the beholder, and a prankster is welcome everywhere. Well, most places. Well, among your friends. Consider this quirk in the nature of the universe as you take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor the Chaos Gun.
2389.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Purchase from Wark near Terra Combusta in Blazeridge Steppes after rescuing him from the infatuated harpy matriarch.
Throw a Jar of Harpy Pheromones at the Modniir Ulgoth in Harathi Hinterlands.
Throw a Jar of Harpy Pheromones at Taidha Covington in Bloodtide Coast.
Throw a Jar of Harpy Pheromones at Mai Trin in her boss fractal.
Throw a Jar of Harpy Pheromones at the Molten Firestorm in the Molten Boss Fractal.
Throw a Jar of Harpy Pheromones at the Molten Berserker in the Molten Boss Fractal.
Throw a Jar of Harpy Pheromones at the Champion Grawl Shaman in the Volcanic Fractal.
Laugh at Marcello DiGiacomo in Lion's Arch.
Laugh at the weak ogres of Degun Shun in Blazeridge Steppes when they ask for help taming pets.
Point and laugh at Gort when he has been kicked out of his home in Kessex Hills.
Consume too much candy corn and be sick in the Mystic Forge of Lion's Arch.
In response to the Colossus bowing to you, eat too much candy corn and be sick in the Cliffside Fractal.
Eat too much candy corn and be sick on a newly cleansed Temple of Dwayna in Malchor's Leap.
Go to the top of the Astrozintli temple in Sparkfly Fen to eat too much candy corn and be sick.
Eat too much candy corn and be sick on the stage of the Crow's Nest Tavern in Lion's Arch.
Eat too much candy corn in the Chamber of Ministers in Divinity's Reach and be sick on the world map.

2408.name: Lessons in Agony
2408.requirement: Complete difficulty scale 20 in the Fractals of the Mists.

2413.name: Mistward Plate
2413.requirement: Collect all  items and skins to forge your Mistward Plate.
2413.locked_text: Complete the Salvation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Plate collection.

bits.text: Dropped by Flame Legion enemies.
Defeat Taidha Covington in Bloodtide Coast.
Purchase for ley-line crystals from Nuhoch vendors in the Heart of Maguuma.

2458.name: Incinerator II: The Perfected Dagger
2458.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Spark has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secret to weighting a blade.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the secret to balancing a hilt.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secrets of superior forging tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2460.name: Bugs in the Branches: Gold
2460.requirement: Jump and glide to collect bugs before time runs out!

2511.name: Daily Fractal Veteran
2511.requirement: Complete  different scale 21–50 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2517.name: Auric Basin Insight: Luminate's Throne
2517.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2618.name: Ba-Boom
2618.requirement: Participate in the assault on the southern octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

2634.name: Tarir Challenge Winner
2634.description: Win one of the challenges during the Invasion of Tarir.
2634.requirement: Place first in / of the Tarir challenges.

2637.name: Frenzy I: The Experimental Harpoon Gun
2637.description: Fishing in Tyria is no pleasant day spent safely on the shore, waiting for a fish to take the bait. It is fought on the fish's home turf, a battle of fisherman against fish. And the fish fight back. Consider this as you take your first steps in crafting the legendary precursor Rage.
2637.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Pulled from the Ancient Barracuda in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Pulled from a Veteran Armored Fish in Malchor's Leap.
Pulled from a Veteran Electric Fish in Mount Maelstrom.
Harvested from a Veteran Giant Arctic Jellyfish in Frostgorge Sound.
Harvested from the Veteran Spiketail fish of Diessa Plateau and Harathi Hinterlands.
Harvested from the Jellyfish Beast in the Underwater Ruins Fractal.

2638.name: Adept Druid
2638.requirement: Begin training the ranger's druid elite specialization.

2695.name: League Necromancer—Elite
2695.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2695.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as a necromancer.

2706.name: League Elite
2706.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.

2721.name: League Top Stats—Elite
2721.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.
2721.requirement: Earn 100 top stats in ranked matches.

2749.name: Daily League Participator—Champion
2749.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.
2749.requirement: Increments each day after playing in 3 ranked matches.

2759.name: Daily League Participator—Recruit
2759.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.
2759.requirement: Increments each day after playing in 3 ranked matches.

2764.name: Winter Wonderland Mastery
2764.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle  time.

2789.name: Donation Drive
2789.description: Doesn't it feel good to give? Even if not, at least it's for a good cause.
2789.requirement: Get wrapped gifts from the Wintersday vendor and give them to orphans around Divinity's Reach daily for a karma and experience boost.

2869.name: Environmental Science 203
2869.requirement: Smash the tree stump in World 2, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2942.name: Daily Adventure: The Floor Is Lava?
2942.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

2957.name: Daily Heart of Maguuma Miner
2957.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
2957.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following Heart of Maguuma maps: Verdant Brink, Auric Basin, Tangled Depths, and Dragon's Stand.

3080.name: Chaos Demolisher
3080.requirement: Complete the Chaos fractal on the Master tier.

3214.name: Quirky Quaggan Quest
3214.requirement: Find all seven stanzas of the quaggan epic poem.

bits.text: Found the First Stanza
Found the Second Stanza
Found the Third Stanza
Found the Fourth Stanza
Found the Fifth Stanza
Found the Sixth Stanza
Delivered All Lost Stanzas to Neekoolaa and Obtained the Seventh Stanza

3323.name: Honorary Crew Member
3323.requirement: Prevent skritt and White Mantle looters from getting away with any supplies stolen from the SS Pinkeens.

bits.text: Stop the skritt.
Stop the White Mantle.

3339.name: Daily Lake Doric: A Peach a Day
3339.requirement: Reach the peach grove and consume its fruit.

3367.name: Friend of the Forest
3367.requirement: Help spirits roaming the Harvest Cascades forest peacefully reach the Mists.

3409.name: Daily Draconis Mons Destroyer Wyvern Boss

3542.name: Storyteller: Dwayna
3542.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Dwayna.

bits.text: Inside the ship that sits on both land and sea.
Stowed inside Dwayna's sunken ship.
Seek insight within the once sunken ship.
Seek those who bring life near Dwayna.
Seek insight within the webs.
Travel through the tunnel to the end that is dead.

3608.name: Dynastic End
3608.requirement: Defeat all the Primeval rulers within the time limit.

3616.name: Desert Highlands Explorer
3616.description: You've explored the rocky hills and windswept basins of the Desert Highlands.
3616.requirement: Explore all areas in Desert Highlands.

bits.text: Transcendent Bay
The Sunderlands
Salt Flats
Enchanted Bluffs
Prophet's Fall
Fortune's Vale
Winter's Teeth
Auburn Hills
Diviner's Reach
Lifeblood Ravine
Stampede Uplands
Brightwater Inlet
Tomb of the Primeval Kings
Windshear Scarps

3645.name: Desolation Insight: The Mouth of Torment
3645.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desolation.

3750.name: Master Holosmith
3750.requirement: Completely train the engineer's holosmith elite specialization.

3795.name: Elon Riverlands Insight: Heroes' Overlook
3795.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Elon Riverlands.

3805.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Sifuri Quicksand
3805.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3967.name: Mercy of the Mordant
3967.description: I have to admit I'm a little disturbed by your enthusiasm.
3967.requirement: End the suffering of all 15 downed foes in the Twilight Oasis fractal in one run.

3997.name: Not So Shocking
3997.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
3997.requirement: Repel the Branded from the Free City of Amnoon without being struck by lightning.

4127.name: Wyvern Whacker
4127.requirement: Slay the champion Branded wyvern outside the Western Complex.

4257.name: [FTT 307] Proficient Dynamics—Gravimetric Tunneling Field Oscillator Level 3
4257.requirement: Applied / Gravimetric Tunneling Field Oscillator Level 2 Upgrades

4292.name: Dolyak Flyer
4292.description: The Flying Dolyak race is a Festival of the Four Winds institution, and you just became a part of its storied history!
4292.requirement: Finish the Flying Dolyak race in Labyrinthine Cliffs within 2 minutes and 30 seconds (race event or adventure).

4295.name: Savage Brute
4295.requirement: Defeat Masticus with max stacks of Bloodlust active.

4307.name: Triple Threat
4307.requirement: Win  third tier matches with three active gambits.

4355.name: Heroes of the Forge
4355.description: But the end is yet to come...
4355.requirement: Defeat Qadim while the challenge mote is active.

4409.name: Mythwright Scholar
4409.description: Knowledge is the most valuable treasure.
4409.requirement: Read every book in the Mythwright Gambit raid instance.

bits.text: Discarded Legendary Relic Concepts
On Elonian Wine
The Four Djinn
Mystic Forge Contract
Zommoros's Journal
Zommoros's Research Notes

4460.name: Favored by the Djinn
4460.description: You've proven yourself a valiant warrior in Djinn's Dominion.
4460.requirement: Gain Yasmi's favor by completing these achievements.

4487.name: Annual Traditions
4487.requirement: Complete the annual Wintersday Traditions achievement. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4489.name: Pitcher of Joy
4489.requirement: Throw 101 snowballs in the Secret Lair of the Snowmen.

4511.name: Chasing Tales: Will to Power
4511.description: Elegos suppressed tales of his prowess by any means necessary.
4511.requirement: Defeat 30 Branded enemies with a staff in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Elegos the Harmless.
Defeated 30 Branded enemies with a staff in Thunderhead Peaks.

4538.name: Reload: Gold
4538.requirement: Collect dredge weapons and bring them to Sergei for stripping.

4577.name: Journeyman of the Forge
4577.description: These weapons will change the world.
4577.requirement: Acquire a full set of Dragonsblood weapons with Aurene.

bits.text: Acquired a Dragonsblood axe.
Acquired a Dragonsblood dagger.
Acquired a Dragonsblood focus.
Acquired a Dragonsblood greatsword.
Acquired a Dragonsblood hammer.
Acquired a Dragonsblood longbow.
Acquired a Dragonsblood mace.
Acquired a Dragonsblood pistol.
Acquired a Dragonsblood rifle.
Acquired a Dragonsblood scepter.
Acquired a Dragonsblood shield.
Acquired a Dragonsblood short bow.
Acquired a Dragonsblood staff.
Acquired a Dragonsblood sword.
Acquired a Dragonsblood torch.
Acquired a Dragonsblood warhorn.

4593.name: Chasing Tales: Storm of Feathers
4593.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a short bow in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Mosa the Majestic.
Defeated 30 enemies with a short bow in Thunderhead Peaks.

4659.name: Bonus Event: World Boss Rush
4659.description: Defeat world bosses around Tyria to earn bonus rewards!

4750.name: Skyscale Rider: Ascalon
4750.description: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise
4750.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in Ascalon.

4806.name: Duke of the Arena
4806.requirement: Finish the season in 11th–25th place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4836.name: (Annual) Paper Dragon
4836.requirement: Bash piñatas in Hoelbrak. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4877.name: (Annual) Boss Blitz: Halt Hablion
4877.requirement: Defeat Justiciar Hablion during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4911.name: Renowned Seeker
4911.requirement: Win 20 games of hide-and-seek with cubs in the Lower Blood Keep.

4970.name: Demolition Derby Don
4970.requirement: Reduce all your opponents to scrap.

5029.name: Reflections in the Ice
5029.requirement: Defeat your frozen clone in 10 seconds or less in the Whisper of Jormag Strike Mission.

5047.name: Daily Storms of Winter Completion
5047.requirement: Participate in the successful completion of Storms of Winter in Bjora Marches.

5087.name: Let Us Finish What You Started
5087.requirement: Aid Jhavi as she travels to Drakkar's Lair.

5088.name: Bjora Marches Insight: Drakkar's Lair
5088.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in Bjora Marches.

5127.name: Jump Up or Get Downed
5127.requirement: Jump over Drakkar's shock wave attack  times.

5143.name: Break It Up
5143.requirement: Break the Defiance of the Fallen Voice and Fallen Claw 5 times.

5236.name: Slaver's Extinction
5236.requirement: Defeat the hostile inhabitants of the ruins in and around Darkrime Delves.

5287.name: Special Mission: Minesweeper
5287.requirement: Defuse 3 minefields at the lighthouse or the mines.
5287.locked_text: Unlock by using Iron Legion Special Mission Documents.

5358.name: Arena of the Wolverine: Silver
5358.requirement: Complete the Arena of the Wolverine adventure with a silver or better ranking.

5360.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Siege of the Frost Citadel
5360.requirement: Participate in a successful siege of the Frost Citadel.

bits.text: Dropped by a Blood tribune.
Dropped by a Frost tribune.
Dropped by an Ash tribune.
Dropped by an Iron tribune.
Dropped by a Flame tribune.
Dropped by a phalanx.
Dropped by a massive charr tank.
Dropped by a Claw of Jormag.

5407.name: Special Mission: The Aberrant
5407.requirement: Defeat  Aberrant in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.
5407.locked_text: Unlock by using Corrupted Intel Documents.

5480.name: Daily Deldrimor Donations
5480.requirement: Donate needed materials to the Deldrimor dwarves.

5734.name: Crop Harvester: Ember Bay
5734.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Ember Bay.

5761.name: Return to Meeting the Asura
5761.requirement: Complete the mission Meeting the Asura in Living World Season 2 Episode 7.

5803.name: Return to Hidden Arcana
5803.requirement: Complete the mission Hidden Arcana in Living World Season 2 Episode 5.

5848.name: Clockwork Precision
5848.requirement: Triumph in an assault on the Twisted Marionette's power regulators without being downed or hit by its special attacks.

5890.name: Adventurous Spirit: Domain of Istan
5890.requirement: Complete any adventure in the Domain of Istan.

5927.name: Revenge of the Death-Branded Shatterer
5927.requirement: Participate in the Death-Branded Shatterer event.

5930.name: World Boss Rush Champion
5930.requirement: During the Boss Rush event, defeat world bosses to gain bonus rewards!

6001.name: Return to Turnabout
6001.requirement: Complete the story mission Turnabout in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 3.

6011.name: Return to Champion's End
6011.requirement: Complete the story mission Champion's End in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 5.

6041.name: Court Duty: Deference to the King
6041.requirement: Survive Mad King Thorn's tricks in the Ascent to Madness mission or participate in his games of Mad King Says in Lion's Arch. Successfully playing Mad King Says awards extra progress.

6110.name: Avid World Class Fisher
6110.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6110.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of the world.

6121.name: Arborstone Vaulter Extraordinaire
6121.requirement: Collect all possible Blessings of Arborstone and return them to the top of the cathedral in one run.

6182.name: New Kaineng Insight: Ancient Vault
6182.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6192.name: Avid Kaineng Fisher
6192.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6192.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Kaineng.

6248.name: Dragon's End Explorer
6248.description: You've explored the frozen waves and ancient sites of Dragon's End.
6248.requirement: Explore all areas in Dragon's End.

bits.text: Mother's Lament
Western Vale
Flooded Basin
Echovald Fringe
The Jade Whirl
Xunlai Jade Quarry
Archipelagos Rim
Outer Terrace
Jade Promenade
Reaver's Ridge
Unwaking Waters
Southern Bluff
Silent Surf
Harvest Complex
Seafarer's Enclave
Clear debris and look for survivors.
Defend Sister Sangsa while she provides first aid.
Escort Sangsa to the Harvest Temple.
Protect the Harvest Temple.

6280.name: Boat Tour for Two
6280.requirement: Give Rama a nice boat ride across Cantha's waters.

6365.name: New Kaineng Insight: Shipwreck Graveyard
6365.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6410.name: Seitung Province Insight: Naga Island
6410.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6436.name: The Jade Vault
6436.requirement: Find 4 jade statuettes for Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, and return them to her.

bits.text: Finish the Kaineng Blackout event or purchase from trading post.
Finish the Gang War of Echovald event or purchase from trading post.
Finish the Aetherblade Assault event in Seitung Province or purchase from trading post.
Defeat the final opponent in the Battle for the Jade Sea or purchase from trading post.
Bring the statuette to Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, in the Royal Court of Shing Jea.
Bring the statuette to Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, in the Royal Court of Shing Jea.
Bring the statuette to Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, in the Royal Court of Shing Jea.
Bring the statuette to Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, in the Royal Court of Shing Jea.

6439.name: Aquatic Trash Collector
6439.requirement: Collect these  junk items by fishing throughout Tyria.

6529.name: Molten Furnace
6529.requirement: Complete the story chapter Molten Furnace.

6535.name: Investigative Study 1
6535.requirement: During the Flame and Frost storyline, find and read sources of information on the Molten Alliance.

bits.text: Letter from Knut (The Command Core)
Field Report from the Ash Legion (The Command Core)
Intel from Crecia (The Command Core)
Bloodstained Letter (Cragstead)
Gigarg's Armor (Molten Furnace)
Rodion's Blood Transfusion Results (Molten Furnace)
Torn Page from Kostya's Lab Journal (Molten Furnace)
Bloodied Journal Entry (Molten Furnace)

6565.name: Plundering the Sky Pirates
6565.requirement: Loot the final treasure chest in the Aetherblade's Secret Base in Gendarran Fields after completing the "Sky Pirates" episode.

6567.name: Tassi Master
6567.description: Story Instance: Hard Boiled—The Scene of the Crime
6567.requirement: Use the Tassi box to scan 11 potential suspects, primary or otherwise.

6587.name: Completing Renown Hearts V
6587.requirement:
Complete  renown heart in Frostgorge Sound.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6597.name: Leveling Up IV
6597.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 70.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6632.name: Fox Fire Weapon Collection
6632.requirement: Unlock all  Fox Fire weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6671.name: Defeating the Flame Legion
6671.requirement: Defeat  Flame Legion enemy in Iron Marches and Fireheart Rise.

6672.name: Depositing Materials
6672.requirement:
Deposit items in your material storage.

<c=@reminder>Material storage is a tab within your account vault that allows you to store crafting materials for easy access when crafting. Items can be deposited directly to the material storage from your inventory at any time.</c>

6868.name: Jumpy Adventurer
6868.requirement: Jump over 10 shock waves from the ravenous wanderer during the final battle of Gyala Delve.

7028.name: Domain of Istan Incursions
7028.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in the Domain of Istan.

7152.name: Omnipresent Oblige Obscure
7152.description: A thousand secrets, and half of them are lethal. It's best not to get lost...
7152.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of the Obscure.

bits.text: Fight off the Kryptis ambush.
Collect relics for Livia and keep the Kryptis from stealing too many.
Help Livia escort the relics by shooting at Kryptis from the magic platforms.
Defeat the Kryptis boss.
Defend Researcher Lezzi as she gathers info about Kryptis rifts.
Quickly disperse the unstable rift before it explodes.
Escort Researcher Lezzi and her new data about Nayos.
Stop the Kryptis from taking the map room.
Exorcise possessed researchers.

7365.name: Black Lion Stolen Goods Recovery Event Week 2—Full
7365.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help collecting stolen goods!
7365.requirement: Collect stolen Black Lion supplies from thieving skritt during the event.

7537.name: Dungeon Rush Champion
7537.requirement: Complete any dungeon path or Dragon Response Mission.

7636.name: WvW Rush Player vs. Player 2
7636.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in World vs. World.

7692.name: Bloodstone Fen Incursions
7692.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Bloodstone Fen.

7714.name: Hero's Origin: Plains of Ashford
7714.requirement:
Complete events in Plains of Ashford in Ascalon.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

7723.name: Jahai Bluffs Rift Hunting
7723.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Jahai Bluffs.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7727.name: Bloodstone Fen Rift Hunting
7727.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Bloodstone Fen.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7756.name: Seeking Scarlet: Twisted Marionette (Weekly)
7756.requirement: Complete the Twisted Marionette group meta-event, which can be accessed from the Eye of the North.

7805.name: Salute the Troops
7805.requirement: Salute Major Emund and the troops at the campfire.

7820.name: Apathetic
7820.description: Killing a disempowered embodiment will grant Cerus their empowered boon.
7820.requirement: Complete the Temple of Febe Strike Mission with challenge mode active and with all of Cerus's emotional aspects empowered.

7907.name: Fabled Hunter
7907.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a ranger.

7979.name: Who's a Good Kryptis?
7979.requirement: Pet the very best Kryptis mount at the recon adventure in Heitor's Territory.

7984.name: The Eleventh Hour
7984.requirement: Ascend the Spire of Dreams and confront the Midnight King.

8006.name: Kaineng Veteran
8006.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8120.name: Returning to Glint's Legacy
8120.requirement: Meet with Lady Valette in Divinity's Reach to learn about the Return to Season 3 event.

8187.name: Full Bloom
8187.requirement: Clear enemies from Rising Bloom's garden without letting him die.

8195.name: The Falling Star: Meteor Wielder
8195.requirement: Acquire a glove fit to hold a weapon from the stars.

8213.name: Master Beekeeper
8213.requirement: Get first place in the honey-gathering race in Bjorn Thicket.

8221.name: Mental Preparations
8221.requirement: Check in with your allies before the battle.

bits.text: Caithe
Malice
Poised Arrow
Stoic Alder

8284.name: Cozy Creator
8284.description: They make for pretty good houseguests.
8284.requirement: Have an ArenaNet employee visit a homestead.

8291.name: A Hard Day's Work
8291.description: The wilds of Janthir are severe and harsh, but a hard day's work is critical for survival.
8291.requirement: Help the kodan with their work throughout Lowland Shore.

bits.text: Woken by Peace is the current liaison to the troll community and needs help maintaining order.
Charging Ram needs help getting the warclaws to work off some steam over in the tundra.
Sheltering Dusk needs a hand helping injured animals in the lower tundra.
Musing Fox is keeping the many bridges safe and sound, but he needs help gathering supplies.
Winding Kant has lost something precious out in the tundra and could use some extra eyes.
Warming Sun is tending to displaced animals in the forest and could use a protector.
Shrouded Woods is trying to meet the lowlander's wood supply needs in the forest and won't say no to help.
Autumn's Breath was tasked with gathering peat in the bog and needs more spears.

8329.name: All Tangled Up
8329.requirement: Complete the warclaw races within the time limit.

bits.text: Greer Entangled
Decima Entangled

8333.name: Return to Nature
8333.requirement: Harvest and bury 25 titanspawn bodies across Lowland Shore.

8428.name: Daily Domain of Vabbi
8428.requirement: Complete  events in Domain of Vabbi.

8583.name: Unplagued
8583.description: If you don't wash your armor now, you'll never get the smell out.
8583.requirement: Defeat Greer with challenge mode active without being afflicted by Plague Rot.

8687.name: Revenge of Prototype XJ-1
8687.requirement: During the Gang War of Echovald meta-event in Echovald Wilds, defeat the legendary Prototype XJ-1.

8722.name: Bava Nisos Insight: Southern Bronchial Well
8722.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery insight in Bava Nisos.

8737.name: Bava Nisos Insight: Mantle's Arrival
8737.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery insight in Bava Nisos.
